templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_id]" value="{$options.client_id}" label="{{ phrase('client_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_amazon_client_id_explain') }}" />
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_secret]" value="{$options.client_secret}" label="{{ phrase('client_secret') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_amazon_client_secret_explain') }}" />

<xf:textboxrow name="options[app_secret_key]" value="{$options.app_secret_key}" label="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_odnoklassniki_app_secret_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_odnoklassniki_app_secret_key_explain') }}" />
<xf:checkboxrow> <xf:option name="options[scope_email]" selected="{$options.scope_email}" label="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_odnoklassniki_scope_email_explain') }}" hint="{{ phrase('jum_con_acc_odnoklassniki_scope_email_explain_hint') }}" /> </xf:checkboxrow>

<xf:if is="!$providerData"> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="explain" arg-providerTitle="{$provider.title}" arg-keyName="{{ phrase('client_id') }}" arg-keyValue="{$provider.options.client_id}" /> <xf:else /> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="success" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="display_name" arg-name="{$providerData.username}" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="email" arg-email="{$providerData.email}" /> </xf:if>

<xf:if is="!$providerData"> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="explain" arg-providerTitle="{$provider.title}" arg-keyName="{{ phrase('app_key') }}" arg-keyValue="{$provider.options.app_key}" /> <xf:else /> <xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="success" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="display_name" arg-name="{$providerData.username}" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="email" arg-email="{$providerData.email}" />
<xf:macro template="connected_account_provider_test_macros" name="picture" arg-url="{$providerData.avatar_url}" /> </xf:if>
